prompts.name: portfolio
prompts.task: Create a single-page personal portfolio with a header, a short bio section, a list of projects, and a footer with social media links.

prompts.name: landing_page
prompts.description: A landing page for a new mobile app.
prompts.task: Design a modern landing page for a fictional mobile app called 'TaskMaster'. It should have a hero section with a screenshot, a features section, and a call-to-action button.
